sect1.title: Resource definition
sect1.para: To define resources for the SSH plug-in we use a comma-separated values (CSV) configuration file. Fields are normally separated by commas. If you want to put a comma in a field, you need to put quotes around it. Also 3 escape sequences are supported.

entry.para: This id string is used just to distinguish different DDS workers in the plug-in.

row.entry: a host name with or without a login, in a form: login@host.fqdn

example.title: An example of an SSH plug-in configuration file
example.programlisting: r1, anar@lxg0527.gsi.de, -p24, /tmp/test, 0 # this is a comment r2, user@lxi001.gsi.de,,/home/user/dds,0 125, user2@host, , /tmp/test,
